name: Dungeons and Daddies - The Game
description:
WORK IN PROGRESS!

How to Play:

Over World:

  • click to move
  • stand in front of chests/doors to open them

Battle:

  • Drag cards to the "x", "y" and "z" slots
    • The "x" and "y" slots determine where the "z" card will take effect
  • Click "commit" to do action "z" at point (x, y)
  • Click "done" when you are finished with your turn

  • Click a tile to get stats about who or what is on that tile.

Menu:

  • Move the mouse to the bottom-left corner of the screen. There you can see a map, descriptions of the cards/stats, and adjust some basic settings

Warning!

This is under development! Notable issues include (but are not limited to):

  • No music
  • Bugs a plenty!
  • Poorly balanced
  • No saving
